body:
@antonsaptana 
Your email Anon.saptana@gmail.com? 
Or 
Anonsaptana@gmail.com? 
I sent an email to you with the first one.

Lol quite a few a times if i'm being honest,  but that's because your translations are a work of "Art" truly vivid and detailed.  Truth be told I find this work very erotic because its like "Dead Space" or the new "Dooms" game where these Alien species brainwash people into thinking their good or somewhat of a "god" but in reality their just using them for there own personal pleasure.  Just like these giant flies but instead of signal waves, they brainwash their prey through sex and ( orgasms where the women are obsessed; and would even die for these bugs) even the men by letting their women mate with these disgusting creatures is a big turn on for me.  Messed up i know :)  but the amount of detail in these stories is what makes it a true Masterpiece.
Holy mother, how many times have you read this series to notice that

The amount of detail in each story is simply amazing .  every time you read you learn something new, through multiple crossbreeding the flies are evolving gaining human-like features with 3 fingers instead of 2 , shorter wings and a tongue.  Alote of people may find this work disturbing but the amount of detail kashinoki has put into these stories and backstory lets you know he/she puts his/her heart and soul into each work he/she creates.

Anton Saptana ........ Your a f**kin Prodigy translator .  Please let me know what card you want so i can compensate you for your Amazing Work!!! I even have a Patron account if you prefer that ? Or if you want a $60 Microsoft live card.  Please let me know and i'll e-mail you the codes ;  and again i want to say amazing work on the translation. Btw can you translate from "Motsu aki" and "Mosquito Man" ,  I will be happy to compensate you for those as well.

Antonsaptana I sent you an e-mail saying if you can post me the first 20 pages to see if looks legit , if it does i'll e-mail the codes for a $20 card of your choosing (Steam, amazon , Etc)  and $30 for the rest.
IT'S FINISHED. DO EMAIL ME AT ANON.SAPTANA@GMAIL.COM AND I'LL SHARE YOU THE DROPBO* LINK
this is just........
English please
antonsaptana when you finish it message any retail gift card you want Steam , Microsoft etc. and i'll e-mail you the codes .  But the translations has to be somewhat accurate though .

Im going to try and translate this myself.
 I am by no means a language expert but hey it's something LOL. 
Where do i upload the finished work? 
If you're interested in helping or just want to see the finished product, send me an email at Anon.saptana@gmail.com
I dont have bitcoin or paypal but if someone could translate this and some stories by "Mosquito Man" i will purchase any $50 card of your choice from a retail store for each one translated .
I Need more..

Rather than the girl I am more curious about what happened to the boy. Was he eaten by the flies or just got killed or something ? And who was the girl who opened the cocoon at the end? Oh well I hope it gets translated.

A. she got eaten
B. she turn into a fucking fly
C. others cause I don't know Japanese

when i saw the the snuff tag i already knew,  but theres something about a girl mindlessly giving her body to a grotesque creature that just does it for me ( fucked up i know) only wish i knew Japanese cause understanding whats shes saying would be icing on the cake.
so did she got eaten alive or what happened? she suppose to be inside the egg hatch or something.
Holy fuck.....
Game over/
This even dark than last series :X
Needs more panels depicting the incubation and the swarm gangbanging her shell, just cutting to the end result was rather lackluster
I dont think it cant get fuck up more than last chapter, I am completly wrong
Yes! It's back!
Fuck you, im out.
